sn36.4:1.3: Tam kho panetam, bhikkhave, assutava puthujjano asantam avijjamanam evam vacam bhasati:
sn36.4:1.5: Saririkanam kho etam, bhikkhave, dukkhanam vedananam adhivacanam yadidam ‘patalo’ti.
sn36.4:1.6: Assutava, bhikkhave, puthujjano saririkaya dukkhaya vedanaya phuttho samano socati kilamati paridevati urattalim kandati sammoham apajjati.
sn36.4:1.7: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘assutava puthujjano patale na paccutthasi, gadhanca najjhaga’.
sn36.4:1.8: Sutava ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavako saririkaya dukkhaya vedanaya phuttho samano neva socati, na kilamati, na paridevati, na urattalim kandati, na sammoham apajjati.
sn36.4:1.9: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘sutava ariyasavako patale paccutthasi, gadhanca ajjhaga’ti.
